effect.black_white: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.black_2_white_2: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.black_white: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.black_white: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
